briefTitle: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Sitagliptin Added to the Regimen of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Metformin (0431-189)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Open-label Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Sitagliptin Added to the Regimen of Patients With T2 DM With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Metformin
summary: After 24 weeks of treatment, to assess the A1C-lowering efficacy of sitagliptin 100 mg once daily added to the regimen of patients with inadequate glycemic control on metformin monotherapy

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin A1C (A1C) at Week 24
